Talks

Selected non-academic speaking engagements, invited talks and interviews. You will also find me running meetups, workshops, and hosting conferences.

  SG Geek Girls Maker Series - The Paradox of Open Source Software: debunking common myths.
  Hackatron Asia: Show & Tell by Ruby Group and Rails Girls - Build it and convince them to come: lessons from Ruby on optimizing for developer happiness.
  Webuild.SG Live Panel - Michael Cheng, Roland Turner and I talk open software, hardware, and business models with WeBuild.SG and their audience.
  Red Dot Ruby Conf Panel Discussion - Winston Teo and I chat with Ruby core team on the state of the community and where Ruby is headed.
